Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = n - 1/2 - (n-3/2)*(-1)^n + binomial(1,n) - 2*binomial(0,n). - _Paul Barry_, Oct 25 2007From _Philippe DelÃ©ham_, Feb 10 2009: (Start)a(n) = 2*a(n-2) - a(n-4), n>=6.G.f.: (x + x^2 + 2*x^3 - x^4 + x^5)/(1-x^2)^2. (End)
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 85000); x=contfrac(tan(1/2)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b019425.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 13 2009(MAGMA) [0,1] cat [n-1/2-(n-3/2)*(-1)^n+Binomial(1,n)- 2*Binomial(0,n): n in [2..80]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 03 2016
